Package com.robinhowlett.chartparser.charts.pdf.wagering

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WageringColumn
    Stores the column name and the positional location of the wagering column
    WageringTreeSet
    A TreeSet for WageringColumn instances, including a custom comparator
    WagerPayoffPools
    Parses the wagering grid and stores WagerPayoffPools.WinPlaceShowPayoffPool and WagerPayoffPools.ExoticPayoffPool instances
    WagerPayoffPools.ColumnRange
    A helper class to store the location of where a column starts and ends ("end" meaning the rightmost-edge of the last character)
    WagerPayoffPools.ExoticPayoffPool
    For a particular exotic wager, parses and stories, where applicable, the name of the exotic bet, the wager unit the bet is based on, a textual description of the winning numbers, the number of correct selections required, the payoff amount, and the pool and carryover size
    WagerPayoffPools.WinPlaceShowPayoffPool
    Stores the total Win-Place-Show (WPS) pool amount, and a list of the various WagerPayoffPools.WinPlaceShowPayoffPool.WinPlaceShowPayoff wager details
    WagerPayoffPools.WinPlaceShowPayoffPool.WinPlaceShowPayoff
    For Win-Place-Show (WPS) wager payoffs, this stores the program number of the Starter, the horse name, and, where applicable, the win, place, and tshow payoff amounts.
    WagerPayoffPools.WinPlaceShowPayoffPool.WinPlaceShowPayoff.Place  
    WagerPayoffPools.WinPlaceShowPayoffPool.WinPlaceShowPayoff.Show  
    WagerPayoffPools.WinPlaceShowPayoffPool.WinPlaceShowPayoff.Win  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WagerPayoffPools.TotalWPSParseException
